name: Johnny Lootem's Going Loopy!
description:
Play as ace pilot turned space scavenger Johnny Lootem in this arcade-style shoot 'em up made in 72 hours as part of Ludum Dare 47 (Theme: Stuck in a Loop.)

___________________________________________________

After travelling through deep space searching for a mysterious ancient relic, our hero Johnny Lootem comes across his planetoid destination. However, evil lurks in the shadows and now Johnny must defend himself against hordes of alien mechanoids!

___________________________________________________

Controls: (Customisable)

Shoot - Z

Bomb - X

Movement - Arrow Keys

Pause - Esc

Fullscreen - F (while paused)

___________________________________________________

Robin Field - Programming/Art

Billy Hobson - Music/Sfx

___________________________________________________

- You can re-enter the dock to purchase upgrades with scrap

- Score is saved after each game over

- Saved score can be used to buy gameplay tweaks

- Score is conserved between plays

___________________________________________________

Have fun :)
